src:
減重名醫教你減肥 正確降低體脂肪（視頻）

02 Nov 2019, 04:59

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月02日訊】想降脂肪肝、體脂肪？減重名醫教你正確方法。
1、少量多餐要不得。
2、運動跟飲食要正確。
3、果糖、含糖飲料要戒掉。
4、延長空腹時間。
還有更多一起了解。
以下YouTube視頻示範：



（責任編輯：張信燕） 本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/02/a102698610.html
text:
Sacramento Kings beat Utah Jazz 102-101
02 Nov 2019, 04:30 by SPORT.es

After this result, the home team is fifteenth in the classification

Sacramento Kings managed to win at home against Utah Jazz 102-101 in a new NBA game. On the previous day, the locals suffered a defeat at home against Charlotte Hornets by 111-118, while the visitors defeated Los Angeles Clippers at home by 110-96. With this result, Sacramento Kings is in fifteenth place and accumulates no victory in five games played, while Utah Jazz is in first place with four wins in five games played. Check the NBA standings after the game.
During the first quarter the leadership was in the hands of the local team, in fact, he got a partial during this quarter of 11-1 and came to win by 12 points (23-11) and finished with a 28-18. Then, during the second quarter Utah Jazz managed to approach the scoreboard, in fact, the team achieved a partial 10-2 during the fourth, which ended with a partial result of 23-30. After this, the rivals accumulated a total of 51-48 points before the break.
The third quarter had alternations on the scoreboard, which ended with a partial result of 30-32 and a total of 81-80. Finally, during the last quarter again there were several changes of leader in the scoreboard and the fourth ended with a partial result of 21-21, thus ending the match with a final result of 102-101 in favor of the premises .
In addition, the Sacramento Kings players who stood out most in the match were De'Aaron Fox and Buddy Hield, who scored 25 points, four assists and five rebounds and 18 points, one assist and five rebounds respectively. On the other hand, the visiting team highlighted Rudy Gobert and Donovan Mitchell, with 15 points and 16 rebounds and 24 points, two assists and four rebounds respectively.
After winning this game, in the next Sacramento Kings clash you will see the faces with New York Knicks at Madison Square Garden. For its part, Utah Jazz will face Los Angeles Clippers at the Staples Center. Follow the full NBA calendar.
